channel.title: CFSSL on ZTALAB Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CFSSL on ZTALAB Blog

item.title: ZACA project introduction
item.description: ZACA ZACA is a Ca pkitls toolkit developed based on cloudflare cfssl ZACA includes the following componentsï¼š TLS service, as the CA center, is used for certificate issuance, revocation, signature and other operations. API services, as some API services for certificate management. OCSP service is a service that queries the online status of certificates and has been signed by OCSP. SDK component, which is used for other services to access the CA SDK as a toolkit for certificate issuance and automatic rotation.
